DVstat

  • How to use

How to use?

Please visit the official website of U.S. Department of State

Or you can search the official website in Google by yourself using keywords: "USA Monthly Immigrant Visa Issuance Statistics"

Choose your desired month

Use "Ctrl" + "a" to choose everything

Use "Ctrl" + "c" to copy data

Paste data to input field and click button
